column1: The following equipment -- required in some states -- will keep you safer: - A front lamp that shines a white light and can be seen from a distance of 300 feet - A red reflector that can be seen from the rear at a distance of 500 feet - Reflectors located on each pedal, or on the shoes or ankles of the bicyclist, that can be seen from 200 feet - Reflective clothing, tape, or patches
